title: Building Efficient Houdini Tools
author: Mehul Joshi
excerpt: Design principles and workflows I use to craft reliable nodes and utilities for Houdini.

content.text: Houdini tools should be predictable, composable, and fast to iterate on. This post shares guidelines I follow when shipping production tools.

# Example: simple parameter promotion
node = hou.pwd()
parm = node.parm("iterations")
if parm is not None:
    hou.ui.displayMessage(f"Iterations: {parm.eval()}")
Prefer small, well-named HDAs over monoliths. Document inputs/outputs inline and ship test scenes.
